entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
